distributed module¶

Pytorch Distributed utils This piece of code was heavily inspired by the equivalent of Fairseq-py https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq

distributed.all_gather_list(data, max_size=4096)¶

Gathers arbitrary data from all nodes into a list.

distributed.all_reduce_and_rescale_tensors(tensors, rescale_denom, buffer_size=10485760)¶

All-reduce and rescale tensors in chunks of the specified size.

Args:
tensors: list of Tensors to all-reduce rescale_denom: denominator for rescaling summed Tensors buffer_size: all-reduce chunk size in bytes
distributed.is_master(gpu_ranks, device_id)¶
distributed.multi_init(device_id, world_size, gpu_ranks)¶
